name: The Valley (itch) (BXC)
description:
Welcome to The Valley!

In this game, you can explore infinite world, battle (in next updates),  build - your only limit is your imagination!

Keep in mind this game is in alpha state, so you can find some bugs. Feel free to send bug reports or your ideas how to improve game to this e-mail: bxc@post.cz

CONTROLS:
W, A, S, D - move
SPACE - jump
Left click - gather resources by punching them (in the next version there will be tools)
Right click - build (more information in build article)
ESC - exit inventory / pause game
E - open inventory
F - change camera view (new character will be in next version)

BUILDING:
Hold CTRL and click on item you want to build with (if it is building item, you'll see location where can be item placed. When you find position for your item, only right click to place it. If you want to destroy it, only click on the item to destroy it.
